name: Metal Rampage Uprising
description:
Metal Rampage: Uprising - plunge into the exciting world of the future, where humanity is in danger from an army of destructive robots. You, in the role of a highly effective combat robot, have become humanity's last hope for salvation.

Embark on an epic adventure through the abandoned remains of cities, where danger lurks at every turn. Your main goal is to destroy the ruthless army of evil robots and fix the triggers.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You need to destroy the enemies of the location, collecting special parts from them that will allow you to further progress through the plot.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- Various enemies and locations
- Good soundtrack
